summary: Adriana, a naive Italian country girl, moves to Rome to become a movie star and experiences the dark side of the business.
cast: Stefania Sandrelli|Mario Adorf|Jean-Claude Brialy|Joachim Fuchsberger|Nino Manfredi|Enrico Maria Salerno|Ugo Tognazzi|Karin Dor|Franco Fabrizi|Turi Ferro|Robert Hoffmann|Franco Nero|Véronique Vendell|Franca Polesello|Renato Terra|Claudio Camaso|Barbara Nelli|Cesarino Miceli Picardi|Solvi Stubing|Rod Dana|Sandro Dori|Vittorio Duse|Vittorio Gassman|Loretta Goggi|Gabriella Lepori|Tatyana Pavlova|Paolo Pietrangeli
title: Yo la conocía bien
